mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id, to_desc_logistics, to_desc_carrier, dest_contact, dest_tel, dest_phone, dest_email, dest_contry_code, dest_zip_code, dest_city, dest_company_name, dest_street, dest_address1, dest_address2, dest_address3, inner_org_id FROM out_order_details where id = #{id}

SELECT id, order_id, to_desc_logistics, to_desc_carrier, dest_contact, dest_tel, dest_phone, dest_email, dest_contry_code, dest_zip_code, dest_city, dest_company_name, dest_street, dest_address1, dest_address2, dest_address3, inner_org_id FROM out_order_details where 1 = 1
